message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I take 6000 and you get 4000.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, Alice.
That seems a bit more balanced, don't you think Bob?  This offer accounts for the inflation factor.
Inflation is on my side, Alice. I'll take a bit more this time.
This is a reasonable offer, Bob, considering the time pressure and inflation working against me.
Time is on my side, Alice. My share is increasing.
Bob, let's be real. This is getting ridiculous.  We both lose if this goes on. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point.
I'm not feeling generous, Alice. The longer we wait, the more I get.
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it, we're running out of time and I won't accept anything less.
I'm not backing down, Alice. You're running out of time.
